function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of comprehensive coverage of all affected countries in the literature review","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through shared personal comfort systems pcs in the built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased human-machine interaction","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slow movement of the internet of things towards humanization","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Scientific studies on indoor air quality","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased online shopping leading to empty retail spaces","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Obsolete parking spaces due to decreased demand","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in land use and zoning due to remote living and working","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Homeless people living in close quarters in shelters and motels","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption in ride-share services and bike sharing","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surging demand through most of 2020 caused by demographic trends and the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in remote work leading to reduced physical interaction and potential decrease in building occupancy","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conversion of office spaces to residential units leading to increased population density in downtown areas","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shifting transportation and land-use patterns leading to changes in urban infrastructure and public spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic impact of high unemployment and social distancing","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental impacts from changed behaviors and economic recovery","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher density associated with higher rates of mortality from and transmission of highly contagious diseases, including covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of in-depth research on measuring connectivity in cities and its impact on the spread of pandemics.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial anxiety leading to homeowners avoiding selling their homes due to uncertainties caused by covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Expectation of higher sale price leading to delay in selling homes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased demand for new construction homes leading to more densely populated areas","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased emphasis on outdoor space may lead to overcrowding in outdoor public spaces, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid adoption of smart-home technology may lead to a false sense of security, neglecting traditional cleaning and disinfection practices.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for home amenities like pools, waterfronts, and docks may lead to overcrowding and increased contact, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Growing interest in gourmet kitchens may result in greater use of communal cooking and dining spaces, leading to potential contamination and the spread of foodborne illnesses.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Blurring lines between work and home life could lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases within households.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Technology-facilitated real-time residential management could lead to increased exposure to contagious diseases if not implemented with appropriate health and safety protocols.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in homebuyer preferences and housing locations due to covid-19 could lead to spread of contagious diseases in new residential areas.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased density in urban areas due to the need for affordable housing. this could lead to higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conversion of office spaces in city centers to residential units could lead to changes in population density and potential disease exposure.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of infection in cities due to close contact in vulnerable households, construction sites, and local businesses.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on digital platforms for cultural resources, municipal services, and participation may lead to increased virtual interactions and dependence.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential long-term coexistence with covid-19 leading to ongoing public health concerns and the need for sustainable recovery strategies.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 crisis-response measures may discourage expansion and maintenance of housing stock, leading to barriers restricting mobility and impacting financial and economic resilience.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customized policy responses to covid-19 are important based on the local situation and the needs of local people.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cities may suffer different consequences of the health crisis, impacting their recovery options and possibilities based on their trade openness, labor market structure, and industrial composition.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Globalization and interconnectivity conventions could be challenged, leading to changes in politics and multi-scalar policies.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The real estate industry was severely affected by the covid-19 pandemic in both the residential and commercial sectors.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of confounding factors with vif ≥ 4 may lead to incomplete understanding of the impact of green space factors on infection rates","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misallocation of resources in coronavirus response, diverting attention from other contagious diseases like influenza.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhanced detection and lower hospitalization thresholds may strain healthcare systems and increase mortality from other serious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Maintaining prolonged lockdowns may lead to worse consequences than an acute epidemic wave, impacting economic and social disruption.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient evidence for entry port screening and social distancing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear evidence on protective measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misallocation of resources due to panic shopping","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underestimation of the infection fatality rate due to uncounted deaths and undiagnosed infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of extreme measures of unknown effectiveness in response to alarming circumstances","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exaggeration of pandemic estimates and case fatality rate","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exaggerated information about covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Withdrawn scientific papers causing confusion","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
